  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoxListener, IIntegrator, AtomLeafAgentManager.AgentSource<IntegratorGear4.Agent>

    IntegratorGear4NPH

    public class IntegratorGear4
extends IntegratorMD
implements AtomLeafAgentManager.AgentSource<IntegratorGear4.Agent>
    Gear 4th-order predictor-corrector integrator.

        Description copied from interface: AtomLeafAgentManager.AgentSource
